website_summaries.verdict: The Samsung Galaxy S20 is the most manageable of the S20 lineup in terms of size and price, but it may get left behind with future 5G upgrades.
cons: Shorter battery life than other S20 (and S10) models

customer_reviews.title: Day4
customer_reviews.text: Upgrade phone, only had for a few days but very pleased. Camera is awesome. What you'd expect for the price tag, fast, responsive etc. Pleased with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: bryan Banner

customer_reviews.title: This Samsung Galaxy S20 Plus can can charge other phones with if they are wireless
customer_reviews.text: This Samsung Galaxy S20 plus is a great phone will recommend friends and family to this product.
customer_reviews.author: S. Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Big disappointment Samsung!
customer_reviews.text: Really good looking phone but not worth the high cost. Poor fingerprint reader, face recognition hardly works and battery life is awful. What is the point of 120hz refresh rate when it depletes battery life so much? Think Samsung need to use Snapdragon high end chips instead of Exynos in UK to improve battery life and quality. Sent phone back and bought a One Plus 8 Pro-NIGHT AND DAY!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Milne

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, despite all the glorifying reviews, this phone is a let down. The software is getting better but still very confusing to get everything up and running. The camera is actually terrible imo as its focus is not evenly distributed in the image and it shows. Fingerprint is the same one used in s10 and is very slow and placed in a awkward situation. at this point I think any flagship phones from the last two years (can be sourced now for less than £300) will do as good a job as any of these new overpriced junks.
customer_reviews.author: Ahmed A.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic phone, awesome camera
customer_reviews.text: I've had S20 Ultra for nearly 4 weeks bought on 28th May this year. i bought this during Lockdown. Cheaper anywhere else. The Fingerprint works for me everytime, i don't use face recognition as i prefer using fingerprint or password. Battery life is better than S10 Plus. The Camera is fantastic, can use different colours like Classic. B&W, Before buying i did research and most people had bad reviews. like the camera on the back has cracked. Mine hasn't it's not overheated yet and i keep it on all day turn it off at 10 at night.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Law

customer_reviews.title: gets very hot
customer_reviews.text: I have bought samsung phones over the years and I have never had the experience of the phone getting very warm, I don't know if it is the battery but I don't want to take that chance. so I have had to return the mobile
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Steve Guest

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING 👏
customer_reviews.text: absolutely love the S20+ Instantly got used to the size difference compared to my S8. The camera has amazing quality and the night mode bangs 👌 The speakers could rival that of some Bluetooth speakers I've own. Only negative is that I should of got the ultra
customer_reviews.author: Robbie

customer_reviews.title: Underwhelmed then returned
customer_reviews.text: At first I was a little underwhelmed by this phone. A definate step up from my Huawei P20 pro but Face ID & Fingerprint a bit slow / clunky compared to my wife's iPhone XR which was much cheaper and for every day photos the camera wasn't much better than my P20 Pro. Than after 2 weeks it developed a rattle inside as if some internal components had come loose. I have now returned it as to me it just doesn't feel or perform like a £1k+ phone.
customer_reviews.author: S. LEES

customer_reviews.title: Terrible battery life
customer_reviews.text: Life of the battery is shocking, worst battery life on a brand new phone ive ever had. This phone was also received with a damaged screen.
customer_reviews.author: anthea

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I've moved from an S7 to this and adore it. The battery life is fab and it charges so quickly, the storage again is amazing. I love the camera and the abilities with it, also the compatibility between my S6 tablet and galaxy watch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazon owe me over £1000 i keep asking for it but don't get know where
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a Samsung s20 ultra in May that was faulty they sent me a replacement that was also faulty so i sent it back you got it back on the 22-7-20 and you have refunded me £4.75 it cost £8.80 to post it back via Royal Mail because i was supposed to send it back via Amazon Locker but the shop had had a break in so they wasn't open that is why we used Royal mail
customer_reviews.author: L B.

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: well I'm writing the review on the phone so if best make it nice. Not that I need much coercing, can't understand anyone buying any other phone. Could be a little less delicate, definitely buy a case asap
customer_reviews.author: TC Hill

customer_reviews.title: Samsungs best flagship so far
customer_reviews.text: After 2 weeks of use i have no complains. Speaker is very loud. Camera is awesome. Battery always holds full day even with heavy use. Dont have any problems with autofocus or green tint so far. Fingerprint reader is slow sometimes, hope they fix this in future update like with the s10( also have whitestone glass on top of it maybe its because of that) can take 2 physical sim cards ( or 1+1 sd card) and 1 extra esim
customer_reviews.author: stan87

customer_reviews.title: Love everything about it
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone. I brought it on a whim during the lockdown as an upgrade to the s10. The screen is gorgeous, the battery is ridiculously good. The phone just dragged everything across from my s10 so it was really easy to switch. The camera is incredible too
customer_reviews.author: HP

customer_reviews.title: Many flaws
customer_reviews.text: The battery absolutely sucks on this device. I highly doubt it will last out for a two year period before becoming so useless as to compel an upgrade. The sound system is terrible, constantly glitching - it's like having an old record player with small scratches. Whether I use bluetooth, USB connection or just straight out it's own speakers it routinely glitches repeatedly throughout the playing music. I suspect this is due to Samsung ripping off the European market by giving the S20 a blatantly inferior CPU, which is known to cause the accelerated battery depletion and I suspect the sound issues too. **DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT**
customer_reviews.author: Karl

customer_reviews.title: childish looking app graphics
customer_reviews.text: I'm somewhat underwhelmed this is my first Samsung and it replaces my much loved Blackberry PRIV the Samsung graphics for the phone camera and contacts all look as if they were designed by a three year old, on the Blackberry all the apps had a crisp display on the Samsung they all look really cheap and so the phone looks really cheap too
customer_reviews.author: Mark Black

customer_reviews.title: Small phone, brilliant product
customer_reviews.text: One of the best Android phones I have used. This phone is a a good as the S20 plus but a lot cheaper. The camera is great and the screen is crisp and clear. The ability to change the refresh rate is another nice touch from Samsung. Personally I would get this phone over the S20 plus anytime.
customer_reviews.author: Cricket Man

customer_reviews.title: Great camera!
customer_reviews.text: Great phone, battery runs down a little quickly, but charges super fast! I'm told it improves with time.
customer_reviews.author: Hutchy

customer_reviews.title: Samsung S20 Cloud Pink
customer_reviews.text: Stylish and Smart, it's my favourite accessory this season because it's so beautiful. I got it yesterday so I haven't used all it's functions yet but it is working perfectly and I can contact my friends and family, and get straight back to studying my BA(Hons) Business and Management degree as it's compatible with my Wi-Fi connections and it does take beautiful pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Louise Scammell

customer_reviews.title: excellent camera capabilities
customer_reviews.text: Great upgrade from my s9. Much better picture quality. I had a good deal with 15% off an already reduced price so I went for it at only £563! And I traded my s9 in for £200 so- no brainer! Battery isn't that much better as its full of the usual samsung bloatware Has a 120hz high frequency setting which gives the use of screen a very smooth action. But it uses more battery.
customer_reviews.author: lawrence Humphreys

customer_reviews.title: Excellent photos
customer_reviews.text: The mobile has surpassed my expectations as regards the photo quality. The photos are crisp, well-exposed, with great and balanced colours at any lighting conditions. The big display is still not too big to handle the mobile comfortably. Its fingerprint reader works well and fast. This excellent phone is a significant improvement compared to - already very good - previous Galaxy models.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overheating phone and poor battery life
customer_reviews.text: Currently on a call to Samsung to rectify my overheating S40 which on low power mode has a temp running at between 40.7-42.7 degrees centigrade, I have had it less than two months and the battery life is not great either... not best pleased as getting through to the tech support is taking ages too... not what you'd expect from a premium brand so far, lets hope they can get things sorted before the phone burns someone.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: it okay
customer_reviews.text: It does not work for 8k when taking photos. It would not let me click into 8k. Other than that battery is excellent. Not much difference to Samsung S9 for the price they charge. Fingerprint reader it too hard to press.
customer_reviews.author: Ghost

customer_reviews.title: good size and fairly light
customer_reviews.text: I like the phone, although I'm still getting used to everything on it, the battery life isn't as good as other phones I've had but maybe that's because im getting used to it and using it more . Its a good size and fairly light
customer_reviews.author: Saint 1

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.text: A good phone, still my daily driver and sturdy too. However... There is a fundamental flaw in many of the S20(Plus and Ultra) phones that causes damage to the right or left driver of headphones and/or earbuds. I've been through 2 earphones and Galaxy buds due to my S20+ somehow murdering them after gentle use. Many people are waiting for a fix for this that most likely won't come until the next phone Samsung brings out as they seem to ignore forums and help tickets relating to this issue.
customer_reviews.author: HYDRA

customer_reviews.title: Great phone, great pictures
customer_reviews.text: This phone is exactly what I was after. I've gone from using an S7, I just wanted a fast phone with a great camera and thats what it is. The pictures come out so good, mostly used on my dogs and I already have some great photos of them. Its also a good size, slightly bigger than the S7 but not too big! I got it in light blue, I was worried I'd get sick of the colour but its actually a really nice touch. Money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Too many flaws
customer_reviews.text: Great tech but bad overall product. Lots of bugs yet to be worked out. The nonstandard screen resolution and cameras result in apps acting very strangely (WhatsApp camera is permanently zoomed in for example, some apps can't launch from browser). The glass on the screen is nowhere near as resistant as on previous Samsungs and mine is scratched up after 2 months of use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: For such a lightweight phone, what a powerful device. No problems setting everything up, just follow the on screen instructions. Although I have large hands, this particular phone would suit someone with small hands.
customer_reviews.author: taurus

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with finger print recognition
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone and the camera is just as amazing as I thought it would be. However I am disappointed that the finger print recognition doesn't work as well as it should for a phone at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Ruchira

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality phone
customer_reviews.text: Very nice phone ,,camera quality is superb,,looks very elegant,happy that I bought it
customer_reviews.author: Kdhl

customer_reviews.title: Description needs to be more accurate and honest.
customer_reviews.text: Only recently bought this. Great phone , bought 2nd hand as having 'no marks' but there were. Screen ok but the top had scratches. The phone was filthy. No attempt had been made to clean the phone. As Covid is again on the increase, it's vital these devices should be cleaned. Early days but the phone is working as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Manning

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Phone
customer_reviews.text: Quick charging, great screen, superb camera with three lens. Setting up is fairly easy but you will need to watch a few videos on U-tube to get the very best out of it.
customer_reviews.author: William P.

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone
customer_reviews.text: The battery life is great and the display is really nice. I like how fast the phone is compared to my Samsung S8+ Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Dawson-Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Good phone but microphone is poor
customer_reviews.text: Good phone but the microphone is poor if you do not use a handsfree headset i.e. people have trouble hearing you
customer_reviews.author: SJB

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone
customer_reviews.text: The phone feels like good quality and the pink colour is lovely. Camera is good and has a variety of settings. Battery lasts all day with proper usage.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Hawksworth

customer_reviews.title: Worse camera ever
customer_reviews.text: The camera on this phone is the worse one I've ever brought. The reason I buy phones is to take photos for my business and 98 out of 100 photos are Blurred very unhappy with paying out over £800 for this
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous phone!
customer_reviews.text: Loveit! love it! Love it! Easy to use , feels great and apps are all straight forward. Great choice. Thank you Amazon!!
customer_reviews.author: Adelaide

customer_reviews.title: Great phone.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't use the face recognition, so I cannot really rate or comment on that. Sometimes I have to press my fingerprint on the screen about 2-3times. Apart from that the phone is great, easy to use and love the quality of the camera. I am still learning about all the good things I can do with this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: oozes quality
customer_reviews.text: great phone and service the phone is awesome with no issues quality device got great sound and camera
customer_reviews.author: Al 🙄

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it. At all.
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this phone especially if you have other options to consider. I've had this for a month and it overheats ridiculously often. Most noticeably after I use navigation for 20 minutes. I had a phone call for an hour and my phone heated up, whereas the person I rang has an iPhone 10 and their phone is perfectly fine. Absolute joke of a phone.
customer_reviews.author: Sruthy

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Great phone got at a good price camera Is brilliant especially when zooming in for close ups of the moon
customer_reviews.author: Geo

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING PHONE - AMAZING SERVICE
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery got it the next day. The Phone is crazy, my brother loves it. 10/10
customer_reviews.author: JaysonM

customer_reviews.title: amazing camera
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent phone, with an amazing camera. Definitely would recommend
customer_reviews.author: charks

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great, don't expect a huge upgrade on the previous two models though
customer_reviews.author: Bizzle

customer_reviews.title: Just not a fan.
customer_reviews.text: Had xiaomi before which was really good, Samsung s20 is missing some of the staff that xiaomi could offer. It's garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: love this new Samsung. Very quick and superior to any other mobile available
customer_reviews.author: jayne spare

customer_reviews.title: the boss
customer_reviews.text: been with ios for years time for a change im glad I did been missing out all these years
customer_reviews.author: keith

customer_reviews.title: Good phone, great camera
customer_reviews.text: Love the phone having changed over from an iPhone. Fingerprint reader doesn't always seem to work which is annoying but otherwise it's great. Good battery life and feels good in the hand.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs L A Evans

customer_reviews.title: A good high end product with good functionality
customer_reviews.text: Very good product durable, screen size and display is very good! Functionality is very good. Battery life is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Stefin Babu Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quicker than expected. Good price. Quality camera and lots of added features on phone. Would recommend phone and seller
customer_reviews.author: A. J. S

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: Got the phone in brand new condition as I was expecting and can't wait to be using it. Also the grey colour stands out well.
customer_reviews.author: Rehan shafiq

customer_reviews.title: Working well so far
customer_reviews.text: Working well so far. It had some apps of EE presumably of the previous owner that had been deleted but the icons still remained and cannot be removed.
customer_reviews.author: Ragvesh

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my nephew and he seems very pleased with the product but as he has just got it unable to comment on battery etc,but overall seems very pleased especially with camera
customer_reviews.author: Mrs  r strange

customer_reviews.title: Great phone.. fingers print recognition is the only let down
customer_reviews.text: Great phone... but again the lower star comes back to the finger print recognition not being consistent enough when opening the phone.
customer_reviews.author: lee

customer_reviews.title: Samsung s20
customer_reviews.text: Very good phone and it was cheaper than anywhere else I saved over 100 pound and I'm highly satisfied and would recommend this phone and the guy I bought it off thanks Amazon keep up the good work
customer_reviews.author: mick moore

customer_reviews.title: Really good phone
customer_reviews.text: The phone is very good, just that it is heavy and the facial recognition doesn't work most times. But every other thing is excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Samsung s20 phone
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded from a Samsung s7, I am very happy with my purchase. The battery life is great, and the camera is super clear. I would definitely recommend this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Gill knowles

customer_reviews.title: Shocking
customer_reviews.text: Charger came broken, it doesn't charge what so ever. I had to put it in the bin. Not very happy considering the price of the phone that also doesn't come with wireless earbuds...
customer_reviews.author: Zander

customer_reviews.title: phone gets very hot
customer_reviews.text: This phone is very nice. Sadly it gets very hot.
customer_reviews.author: Lina

customer_reviews.title: Best phone you can buy
customer_reviews.text: Amazing phone. Probably the best phone out, fast, smooth, high quality camera and loads more.
customer_reviews.author: Muhammed Aadam Hafeez

customer_reviews.title: Like
customer_reviews.text: I like sooooo much wery good thanks to delivery sooooo fast thank you wery much i like the phone
customer_reviews.author: ERIKA TOMPOS   and TIBOR TOMPOS

customer_reviews.title: S20 is epic
customer_reviews.text: For my first phone this was definitely worth it. Got everything a person needs. Best camera and software
customer_reviews.author: Edwin John

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: Wide angle camera is fab. Size and thin bezel are great.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs K Roos

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant combination of camera and quality phone 📱
customer_reviews.text: This is the best 👌 phone 📱 on the market at the moment, how are you going to better this product 😀
customer_reviews.author: Brian M Beardmore

customer_reviews.title: phone
customer_reviews.text: excellent phone just too big for daily use wearing shorts and had problem with the clarity of the mic and speaker
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo

customer_reviews.title: The version of the phone is not what it says
customer_reviews.text: The phone itself is really good but its polish version though it says the seller is selling UK version. Not happy with that.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: great phone
customer_reviews.text: other than the usual bloatware which takes a while to get rid of I like the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Adel Nasseri

customer_reviews.title: Excellent phone
customer_reviews.text: Excellent performing phone with great screen and camera. Built well.
customer_reviews.author: A Mirza

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: Please don’t waste your money . Camera quality isn’t even that great . It gets over heated within few mins of mild usage . Performance was way too slow . I had to send it back .
customer_reviews.author: latoya

customer_reviews.title: Best phone on the market IMO
customer_reviews.text: This is my review of the S20+ having owned an S8 for quite a few years. Pros: . No more Bixby key!!! - can't tell you how pleased about this I am . Improved camera . 5G ready - I don't have coverage yet, but at least it's 5G ready when I do. Note the S20 is only 4G. . Best screen on the market . The smart switch made it very easy to copy over all apps, photos, music etc from old S8. Cons: . Getting big now. I'll have to get used to this but it feels slightly uncomfortable at this size. . Expensive. Is it really worth £1K?.. Jury's out.
customer_reviews.author: S. Atkins

customer_reviews.title: nice but nothing special
customer_reviews.text: i bought the s20+ as a replacement for my note 10+, and to be honest thats the problem, the s20+ is really a very nice peice of gear but as a replacement for an already great phone (note 10+) its a bad idea, it really depends on what your upgrading from.
customer_reviews.author: stuart

customer_reviews.title: Superphone - Samsung S20+
customer_reviews.text: Superb phone from any aspect. The camera is out of this world and light years ahead of my Samsung A70 which it replaced. One snag, it's 5G which should be a very good thing but I didn't realise that some 4G operations are slower. In particular, the current vogue for sites to send you a verification code means you are occasionally timed out by the time the code arrives. Still, I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: John Baker

customer_reviews.title: Excellent all rounder
customer_reviews.text: The camera is amazing and what is even more impressive is the steadycam feature for video filming. very difficult to find fault with colour balance and exposure, both of which are very good. All other features are good or excellent.
customer_reviews.author: simon manley-cooper

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase.
customer_reviews.text: The phone is light, functional and easy to use. I managed to set up up myself and transfer everything necessary from my old phone. I have never done this before. The battery life could be better (my husbands iPhone is) but it is adequate and will last a day plus. I cannot comment on the facial recognition as I haven't used it.
customer_reviews.author: Celia Peters

customer_reviews.title: Why is the phone always warm?
customer_reviews.text: The phone was always warm and got very warm when watching Netflix. S20 crashed a couple of times when using the camera. The screen is brilliant but sent it back due poor battery life and heat from the phone. Never had this problem with other phones expect when gaming.
customer_reviews.author: Gibby

customer_reviews.title: Great all rounder
customer_reviews.text: Great all round phone. Camera is much improved from the S10 series. Lovely screen, great battery and Samsung software is now very very good! Would like proper face recognition and faster charging would be good.
customer_reviews.author: D. G. Long

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: Great phone can't fault it lovely screen heard a lot of negative reviews but i cannot fault it battery lasts 2 days maybe 3 with normal use price is a bit much but other than that highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: sarah hull

customer_reviews.title: Great xx
customer_reviews.text: Great phone, it was to replace an s8 that wasn't holding its charge so absolutely great. I use my phone quite a bit so charge it everyday but sometimes I don't really need to. Graphics r great and camera is amazing. Great phone and well worth the.price.i paid.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced
customer_reviews.text: I use Galaxy since S1 but in my opinion there is no point in upgrading to S20 from S10 (not worth the money). Btw, the wifi wasn't working properly in the piece I received - returned.
customer_reviews.author: Monika

customer_reviews.title: one of the best phones
customer_reviews.text: really happy so far. wait to see how well it lasts i expect it to last as if not longer than my last phone which is still working now.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. C. Pugh

customer_reviews.title: nothing better then my s8
customer_reviews.text: it is called S20 5G but it is no better then my old S8
customer_reviews.author: Mendel kahan

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: Appalling product, got so hot i couldn't hold it. Avoid
customer_reviews.author: Jogb

customer_reviews.title: Once you go 120hz you can't go back.
customer_reviews.text: The 120hz display alone makes this phone a must have.
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian

customer_reviews.title: Stunning phone
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded from S10plus - this is faster, brighter and better. Very happy
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: So good!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a present for my husband and he loves it! 😍
customer_reviews.author: Mephis1

customer_reviews.title: s20 no plus ultra
customer_reviews.text: verry nice phone not to big not to small its samsung
customer_reviews.author: Mitrea A.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Lovely fone still getting used to what it can do .. no complaints
customer_reviews.author: rachel

customer_reviews.title: Poor battery life
customer_reviews.text: Overall not a bad device. However the battery life is very poor.
customer_reviews.author: Stevem

customer_reviews.title: Never go wrong with a samsung galaxy
customer_reviews.text: Great phone! Amazing camera and the fingerprint reader is a lot more responsive than the s8. Feels a lot more fluid to use than most other phones
customer_reviews.author: Theo Windebank

product_meta.title: Samsung Galaxy S20 Mobile Phone; Sim Free Smartphone - Cosmic Grey (UK version)
product_meta.description: Colour Name:Cosmic Grey| Size Name:128 GB| Style Name:S20 (4G)The phone to make every moment, an epic moment. An Android smartphone with a 10 MP Front Camera and a triple rear camera system, including a huge 64 MP Telephoto Camera, the Samsung Galaxy S20 mobile phone will capture life as you truly see it. The SIM free Galaxy S20’s whopping 64 MP high resolution camera offers super sharp resolution that keeps the clarity on images, even when cropped. Featuring Single Take, this Samsung mobile phone allowing you to shoot for up to 10 seconds and get back a variety of formats – meaning you can choose the best style for the moment without having to reshoot. Capture videos fit for the big screen. Samsung has revolutionised the resolution for mobile video – taking it from 4K all the way to 8K. That’s 4 times bigger than UHD and 16 times bigger than FHD. Night Mode means you can shoot night time scenes like daylight with the Samsung Galaxy S20 smart phone. In low light, the pro-grade camera system of this Android phone captures multiple photos at once, merging them into one stunning shot with less blur. Experience a refresh rate with the Galaxy S20 mobile phone that allows for incredibly smooth scrolling and gaming. 120 Hz makes your scrolling smooth with seamless screen transitions. While super-fast precise touch response delivers a more reactive gaming experience on this smartphone. Power on and on and on. The Galaxy S20 smartphone series are fitted with big batteries to last you the day and more.¹ (¹ Typical value tested under third-party laboratory condition. Rated capacity for the Galaxy S20 is 3,880 mAh.)
feature_bullets: 64 MP Telephoto Camera; 10 MP Front Camera; 12 MP Wide Camera; capture life as you truly see it
120 Hz 6.2 Inch Infinity-O Display: Experience every moment in full, edge-to-edge clarity
Galaxy S20 battery packs in 4,000 mAh so you can stay in charge throughout the day
8 GB RAM; Exynos 990 Processor and the capability of 1.1 TB Storage; truly epic power for truly epic days
Smartphone preloaded with the Android V10 operating system

specifications.Delivery information:: We cannot deliver certain products outside mainland UK ( ). We will only be able to confirm if this product can be delivered to your chosen address when you enter your delivery address at checkout.
